sentences.en: a household with an annual income of 60,000
sentences.cn: 年收入六万美元的家庭
每年的花销、学费和各项杂费6,600英镑。

sentences.en: Cannes hosts the annual film festival.
He tried the various almanacs, annuals and gazettes which were held in the library.
sentences.cn: 他试着在图书馆里找过各种历书、年鉴和报纸。
她的年营业额大约是4.5万英镑。

sentences.en: How much is the annual ground rent?
I looked for Wyman'spicture in my high-school annual.
sentences.cn: 我在中学年刊中寻找怀曼的照片。

sentences.en: It has been let at an annual rental of 393,000.
sentences.cn: 它以每年39.3万英镑的价格被租了出去。

sentences.en: The annual slaughter of wildlife in Italy is horrific.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，每年大量捕杀野生动物的现象令人震惊。

sentences.en: The eight-year bond will bear annual interest of 10.5%.
sentences.cn: 这种8年期的债券年利率为10.5%。

sentences.en: The electronic and printing unit has annual sales of about $80 million.
sentences.cn: 电子印刷部门每年销售额约为8,000万美元。

sentences.en: The Professional Cricketers' Association held its annual dinner in London.
sentences.cn: 职业板球运动员协会在伦敦举办了自己的年度宴会。

sentences.en: The review body has produced a truncated version of its annual report.
sentences.cn: 该评论机构出版了其年报的删节版本。

sentences.en: The school trip has become an annual event.
sentences.cn: 学校组织的旅行成了一年一度的活动。

sentences.en: This week, the company mailed out its annual report.
sentences.cn: 本周该公司群发了其年度报告。

sentences.en: Three million people will visit theatres in the annual six-week season.
sentences.cn: 在每年为期6周的戏剧季里，会有300万人去看戏。

sentences.en: We saw in Chapter 16 how annual cash budgets are produced.
sentences.cn: 在第16章我们了解了年度现金预算是怎样制订的。

phrases.tran_cn: 年报，年度报告；年度决算；年度财务报告
年营业额，年成交量；年总生物量

trans.tran_cn: 每年的，一年一次的，全年的

trans.tran_en: a plant that lives for one year or season
